properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 8:39AM CST until February 22 at 9:20AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Calhoun and Paradise

.The Green River at Calhoun and Paradise are both at minor
flood stage at this time. The Green River at Calhoun is forecast
to fall below flood stage early this Saturday, but the Green
River at Paradise will likely remain in minor flooding through
February 26th.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Calhoun.
* until Saturday morning.
* At  8:00 AM Thursday the stage was 26.5 feet.
* Flood Stage is 23.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
this Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 26.0 Feet...Moderate flooding occurs with thousands of
acreage flooded in the Island, Rumsey, and Jewel City areas.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
